page.title: 03SCHOOL GAMES
page.content:
HERE IS A LIST OF GAMES WE SOMETIMES PLAY IN OUR PRIMARY SCHOOL.
HOSPITAL TIG :FOOTBALL :HIDE AND SEEK :BALLS :CHASES :PINK MURDER :ROUNDERS :POLE TIG :BULLDOGS: ROPES.
IN CLASS WE DREW A CHART AND THEN WENT AROUND ALL THE CLASSES TO FIND OUT HOW MANY PEOPLE PLAYED EACH GAME. THE MOST POPULAR GAME THAT DAY WAS FOOTBALL THEN CHASES. ONLY FOUR PEOPLE PLAYED BULLDOGS. WE MADE A NEW LIST AND PUT THE MOST POPULAR GAME AT THE TOP AND THE NUMBER OF CHILDREN WHO PLAYED THAT GAME BESIDE IT. FOOTBALL 75, CHASES 43, HIDE AND SEEK 41, BALLS 28, ROPES 15, BULLDOGS 4, POLE TIG, ROUNDERS, PINK MURDER AND HOSPITAL TIG, ALL 0.
